reviews.text: If the reason for going to SP is near the Estanplaza Funchal, either the office you are working at, or the shopping centers you plan to visit, this hotel can be a good choice.
reviews.title: A good option if you plan to stay in the neighbourhood

reviews.text: The pros: Excellent breakfast and ample rooms.
reviews.title: Great Location+Staff: Poor Hotel

reviews.text: The cons: The wifi is not good (even if you pay for it!) what is really bad if you plan to work in your room. The aircon (heating) was not enough for dealing with the - very - cold weather i happen to find during my visit.
reviews.title: Estanplaza Funchal

reviews.text: But, in general, a nice hotel for SP.
reviews.title: Nice rooms and breakfast, poor service at front desk

reviews.text: For the first time I’m writing a review while still at the hotel----at least for the next few minutes. Even though I’m pre-paid for the next night, I’m out of here and moving on to another hotel. The staff here are wonderful and caring but the rooms are very poor. Old and dated, carpet work out, broken lamps and not at all clean. Something bit me in the middle of the night and not sure what it is. Using the light controls takes a while to figure out, the bathrooms are seedy and old and the whole room smells. No irons available so I went to my early meeting looking rumpled.
reviews.title: Great choice!
